TEXT.TITLE: SERVICE RESOURCES <SRC> ENDS SORG <SRG> BID
TEXT.BODY: Service Resources Corp said it has withdrawn and terminated its 23 dlr per share takeover offer to Sorg Inc because Sorg failed to respond to the bid. It said, as Sorg's largest single shareholder, it will evaluate all its options, including making a further offer to Sorg or disposing of some or all of its Sorg shares. Reuter
